gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Clippers 130, Hornets 118
gameRecap.excerpt: The Clippers won their third straight as they defeated the Hornets, 130-118. Paul George totaled season-highs in points (41) and 3PM (eight), along with seven rebounds as Kawhi Leonard added 23 points and five rebounds. Miles Bridges led Charlotte with 33 points and seven rebounds. The Clippers got their 25th road win of the year, joining MIN and BOS as only teams to reach total. Los Angeles improves to 47-27 as Charlotte moves to 18-56.
